commit.message:
re PR c++/58466 (ICE in cxx_eval_constant_expression)

/cp
2013-10-18  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/58466

	get_class_bindings.

/testsuite
2013-10-18  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/58466
	* g++.dg/cpp0x/variadic145.C: New.

From-SVN: r203836
